# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering the high standards and craftsmanship involved, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. This opportunity won't last long, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
